1- Warranty: Supplier undertakes and warrants to the buyer that all products, materials, equipment's, services to be performed under the Purchase Order are in conformity with the specifications under the Purchase Order and meets the specifications, drawings or descriptions on the face hereof or on attached specification sheets (which are incorporated herein by reference), and are of good and merchantable quality and will fit the buyer's intended purposes and known to the Supplier to be, free of defects in material and workmanship. All drawings provided hereunder shall be the property of Buyer and for his usage free of charge regardless of any provision or notation to the contrary on such drawings. The Supplier warrants that the product will be produced, sold and delivered in compliance with all applicable Saudi Laws, rules, and regulations.
2- Entire Agreement: This purchase order and the additional product quality and performance representations by Supplier, constitutes the entire agreement between the parties. The Buyer shall not be bound by any prior or future terms and conditions not provided for herein or by a written amendment. Any additional or inconsistent terms shown on Supplier's sales confirmation, shipping, documents or invoices, and any additions of inconsistencies therein with the provisions hereof shall be null and void.
3- Price: (a)- All prices specified and stipulated in the Purchase Order are net prices, unless indicated otherwise and agreed upon in writing shall be inclusive of all fees, charges, expenses of all kinds. (b)- Prices shall be subject to expenses deductions, or losses that may be incurred due to transport outage, imperfections, or defects in commodity or equipment, or noncompliance with samples and /or specifications whether clear or implied, or none compliance with the delivery date. (All prices shown in the P.O reflect the net price agreed upon inclusive of all applicable discounts, fees, any charges, custom duties and transportation charges, to delivery destination specified by the buyer. (c)- Changes: No claims, additional expenses or charges will be allowed by Supplier for additional work, material, packing service, and no substitution of material or changes in price will be permitted unless authorized by the buyer in writing. (d)- Taxes and Other Charges: Should any duties, Social Security and/or taxes including Zakat and Saudi Income Tax be assessed against or imposed on the Supplier by reason of any work, labor, or services performed for the buyer the Supplier will be solely responsible for such liabilities.

4- Payment: the buyer shall pay to the Supplier for the products, supplies or provided services within 60 days from the date of receipt of commercial invoice unless otherwise stated in the Purchase Order.
5- The buyer has the right to reject any supplies, equipment, products or services which are not in accordance with the specifications and ask for replacement or correction, and in case of the Supplier failure the buyer shall replace or correct the same at the Suppliers' expense. 6- Title: The title and risk of loss and or damage to all sold products or services hereunder shall pass to buyer upon receiving and acceptance by the buyer. The Supplier warrants that the title is free and clear from any and all mortgages and encumbrances whatsoever.
7- Force Majeure: Neither Party shall be liable for failure or delays caused by conditions beyond their reasonable control, provided that a written notice thereof should be provided to the other party as soon as practicable. Any situation preventing performance or execution of the agreement shall be remedied as soon as reasonably possible. The Buyer in its sole discretion reserves the right to cancel the order if such delay is caused by the Supplier as time is essence of the order. 8 - Penalties: A. If the Supplier fails to perform his commitments indicated in the Purchase Order, the buyer shall be entitled to arrange alternative supplier at the Supplier's expense. Under such circumstances the Supplier shall be liable for the actual cost of damages suffered by the buyer plus other administrative expenses. B. If the Supplier fails to fulfill his obligations in part or in hole under the terms of Purchase order , the Supplier shall be liable to pay a penalty equal to 1% of the value of the delayed goods or services up to 6%, however in case of construction the maximum penalty shall be up to 10% in accordance with Purchases laws applicable in the kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

Gratuities and commissions: The Supplier understands that the Buyer policy prohibits any contracting party from paying a commission or giving a gift to anyone to influence the execution terms and performance of the contract, Otherwise the Buyer shall be entitled to claim the retrieval of such payments or gifts as being excess of his contract. In such case the Buyer reserves the right to take disciplinary and/or criminal action under the laws and regulations applicable in the kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

General: The buyer will not be responsible for any injury sustained by the Supplier's personnel or any damage occurred to the equipment during the performance of his obligations under this Purchase Order. However the Supplier will also be held responsible for injury he may cause to buyer's or any third party employees or damage to their property or equipment during the performance of his obligations under this Purchase Order.

11 - Indemnity: The Supplier undertakes to indemnify and hold buyer, its employees, contractors, agents and Suppliers, harmless from and against any all claims, suits, judgments, or expenses, including reasonable attorney's fees, which are based in whole or part upon breach of Supplier's warranties, or Supplier's negligence, including without limitation, claims, suits or judgments for personal injury including death, or property damage arising out of or relating directly or indirectly to this purchase order.

12 - Notices: All notices hereunder shall be deemed given if delivered in writing personally or by courier, or sent by mail, electronic transmission, facsimile to buyer or to Supplier at the address set forth in this purchase order. Any notice given by mail shall be deemed given at the time such notice is transmitted through mail.
13 - Assignment: This purchase order shall extend to and be binding upon the parties hereto, their successors, and assignees, provided, that the parties agreed in writing for such assignment.

14 - Patents : The Supplier, its heirs, successors, assignees and legal representatives, shall forever protect, indemnify and save harmless the buyer, its customers, agents, and (Distributer), against all claims, suits, judgments, court costs, attorney's fees and other liabilities demands or losses in any manner arising out of alleged infringement of any patent copyright or trademark, rights because of their possession, use or sale or the subject matter to which this purchase order relates, The Supplier shall promptly notify the Buyer of bringing of any suit. Supplier shall have the rights to be represented in defense thereof by counsel of its own selection and at its own expense. Buyer ,its customers, contractors, agents and (Distributers), shall have a free and unrestricted right and licenses to use said subject matter in any and all arts and under all patents in or under which Buyer may now or in future have an interest.

15 - Non-Waiver: Waiver of any breach, failure to enforce any of the terms or conditions of this purchase order or course of conduct at any time shall not limit or waive either party's rights thereafter to enforce or compel strict compliance with every term and condition of this purchase order.

16 - Confidentiality: This purchase order, the items ordered, quantity, specifications and price shall be deemed confidential and shall not be revealed by Supplier to any third party not necessary for the completion of the order unless permission is first obtained in writing from buyer.

17 - Audit: Except for firm fixed price orders, Buyer may, upon its request, audit any and all records of Supplier relating to material and/ or services provided hereunder, provided, however, Supplier shall have the right to exclude any trade secrets, formulas, or processes from such inspection. Supplier further agrees to maintain its books and records relating to material and / or services provided hereunder for a period of two (2) years from the date such material and / or services were provided and to make such books and records available to buyer at any time or times within the two year period.

18 - Conflict of interest: The Supplier warrants that it has not given or received any commissions, payments, gifts, kickbacks, lavish or extensive entertainment or other things of value to or from any employees or buyer agents or any third party in connection with this purchase order. As well, the Supplier acknowledges that the giving or receiving of any such payments, gifts, entertainment, or other things of value is strict violation of Buyer's corporate policy and may result in the cancellation of this and all future purchase orders. Supplier shall notify Buyer's audit department of any such solicitation by any of buyer's employees, agents or any third party

19 - Acceptance: The Supplier admits it has read and understands the conditions of this purchase order and acknowledges that Supplier's written acceptance (will be within 10 days from the date of receipt of purchase order otherwise it considered as accepted, and the commencement of any work or services under this purchase order shall constitute the Supplier's acceptance of these terms and conditions.
20 - Termination: The Buyer may terminate this purchase order, with or without cause, upon a minimum of fourteen (14) days prior written notice to Supplier.

21 - No Advertising: The Supplier shall not, without first obtaining the written consent of buyer in any manner advertise or publish the fact that Supplier has contracted to furnish buyer with the goods or services or works covered by this purchase order, or use any trademarks or trade names of buyer in Supplier's advertising or promotional materials.

22 - Applicable Laws and Jurisdiction: This Purchase Order shall be subject to the laws, Rules and Regulations applicable in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The parties will try to settle any dispute amicably otherwise it will be subject to arbitration in accordance with the arbitration law of Saudi Arabia, without prejudice to the jurisdictions of the appropriate courts of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia .
